resource.string: You do not have enough influence.
You do not have enough money.
The target character was wounded.
This character must be at least %n years old.
This character must be rank %n or higher.
This character must be at least %n years old and rank %n or higher.
Force this character to divorce his wife.
Spread rumours about this character to decrease his gravitas.
Bribe this character to bring him over to your party. The target character will lose gravitas if he accepts.
Influence: %d
Cost: %d
Arrange a marriage between this man and one of your distant relatives. This event will win influence for the weaker party.
Adopt this character into your party.
Attempt to have this character assassinated.
You cannot assassinate your faction leader.
Character adopted
Heads of parties cannot be bribed.
Heads of parties cannot be adopted.
%n Gravitas
Use your influence to promote this character to a higher office.
The target character was killed.
Attempt to have the wife of this character assassinated.
